mapper.insert: insert into exchangeable_goods (Id, Code, Name, NeedIntegral, Remains, AddTime, UpdateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remains,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into exchangeable_goods
Id,
Code,
Name,
NeedIntegral,
Remains,
AddTime,
UpdateTime,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{needIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remains,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update exchangeable_goods
Code= #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name= #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NeedIntegral=#{needIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Remains= #{remains,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AddTime=#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateTime=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from exchangeable_goods
and Id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and Code= #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and Name= #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and NeedIntegral =#{needIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and Remains=#{remains,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and AddTime=#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and UpdateTime=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
